services.name: Routine Checkup & Cleaning
services.description: Comprehensive oral examination and professional cleaning to maintain your dental health.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Professional in-office whitening treatment for a brighter, more confident smile.

services.name: Dental Implant Consultation
services.description: Evaluation and planning for dental implants, including X-rays and treatment options.

services.name: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: Treatment to save an infected tooth by removing the damaged pulp and sealing the canal.

services.name: Orthodontic Consultation
services.description: Assessment for braces or clear aligners to straighten your teeth.

services.name: Emergency Dental Care
services.description: Immediate care for dental emergencies like severe pain, broken teeth, or infections.

team.name: Dr. Amit Opek
team.bio: Dr. Opek has over 15 years of experience in general and cosmetic dentistry. He graduated from Tel Aviv University School of Dental Medicine.

team.name: Dr. Sarah Cohen
team.bio: Specializing in Invisalign and traditional braces, Dr. Cohen helps patients of all ages achieve beautiful smiles.

team.name: Maya Levy
team.bio: Maya is dedicated to patient comfort and education, making every cleaning a pleasant experience.

faqs.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
faqs.answer: We primarily see patients by appointment, but we do our best to accommodate emergencies. Please call ahead.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, and direct billing to most insurance providers.

faqs.question: Is parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, free parking is available in the building lot.

faqs.question: Do you treat children?
faqs.answer: Yes, we welcome patients of all ages, including children. We have a kid-friendly waiting area.

policies.cancellation: Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations to avoid a cancellation fee.
policies.payment: Payment is due at the time of service. We can provide documentation for insurance reimbursement.
policies.emergency: For after-hours emergencies, call our main line and follow the prompts for emergency care.
